name: Margarita
instructions: 1. Rub rim of glass with lime wedge.\\n2. Dip rim in salt.\\n3. Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: 1. In a rocks glass dissolve sugar in water and bitters.\\n2. Add ice and bourbon.\\n3. Stir.

name: Cosmopolitan
ingredients: Vodka, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, Cranberry Juice
instructions: 1. Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

name: Negroni
instructions: 1. Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: 1. Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into glass.
